chart_description: This chart shows the amount of time in milliseconds when the I/O operation takes longer than the set limit due to some pressure on the system. The stall time can be caused by various factors such as too many I/O operations, disk failures, or insufficient resources.

dimension_descriptions.some 10: This dimension shows the stall time for an I/O operation that happens in every 10 seconds.
dimension_descriptions.some 300: This dimension shows the stall time for an I/O operation that happens in every 5 minutes.
dimension_descriptions.some 60: This dimension shows the stall time for an I/O operation that happens in every minute.
